author: arnetheduck
content: that's an odd phrasing, if anything - ie on the consensus side we're doing deneb and ei4844 is one of the features in it - I'd assume the situation is the same for the EL, with a hard fork and candidate features?

author: timbeiko
content: Correct: 4844 is part of Cancun on the EL side. I wanted to emphasize that we don't know what the full scope for Cancun is yet, though, as we haven't really had the discussion + given the opportunity to EIP champions to propose additional changes.
